import React, { useEffect, useRef, useState } from 'react'; import { FaHeart, FaAngleDoubleRight, FaChevronRight, FaHandsHelping, FaPhoneAlt, FaCheck, FaBookOpen, FaHeartbeat, FaTint, FaHome, FaBed, FaUtensils, FaUserNurse, FaShieldAlt, FaWheelchair, FaPlay, FaQuestionCircle, FaQuoteLeft, FaCalendarAlt, FaCheckCircle, FaHandHoldingHeart, FaChartPie, FaBullhorn, FaChevronDown,FaArrowRight } from 'react-icons/fa'; import { Swiper, SwiperSlide } from 'swiper/react'; import { Autoplay, Pagination, Navigation } from 'swiper/modules'; import 'swiper/css'; import 'swiper/css/pagination'; import 'swiper/css/navigation'; import Navbar from './Navbar'; import Footer from './Footer'; import './HomePage.css'; function AnimatedNumber({ end, duration }) { const [val, setVal] = useState(0); useEffect(() => { let start = 0; const startTime = performance.now(); const step = (now) => { const p = Math.min((now - startTime) / duration, 1); const ease = 1 - Math.pow(1 - p, 3); const current = Math.floor(ease * end); if (current !== start) { start = current; setVal(current); } if (p < 1) requestAnimationFrame(step); }; requestAnimationFrame(step); }, [end, duration]); return <>{val.toLocaleString()}; } function HomePage() { const [startCount6, setStartCount6] = useState(false); const ref6 = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const io6 = new IntersectionObserver(([e]) => { if (e.isIntersecting) setStartCount6(true); }, { threshold: 0.3 }); if (ref6.current) io6.observe(ref6.current); return () => io6.disconnect(); }, []); const stats6 = [ { label: 'Seniors Sheltered', end: 1200 }, { label: 'Meals Served', end: 480000 }, { label: 'Medical Checkups', end: 32000 }, { label: 'Caregivers Trained', end: 850 } ]; const features6 = [ { icon: , title: 'Safe Homes' }, { icon: , title: 'Comfortable Bedding' }, { icon: , title: 'Nutritious Meals' }, { icon: , title: '24/7 Care' }, { icon: , title: 'Security & Dignity' }, { icon: , title: 'Accessible Facilities' } ]; const [inView7, setInView7] = useState(false); const [faqOpen7, setFaqOpen7] = useState(null); const ref7 = useRef(null); useEffect(() => { const io7 = new IntersectionObserver(([e]) => { if (e.isIntersecting) setInView7(true); }, { threshold: 0.25 }); if (ref7.current) io7.observe(ref7.current); return () => io7.disconnect(); }, []); const stats7 = [ { label: 'Beds Supported', value: 240, suffix: '+' }, { label: 'Monthly Meals', value: 16000, suffix: '+' }, { label: 'Medical Visits', value: 1200, suffix: '+' }, { label: 'Volunteers', value: 380, suffix: '+' } ]; const stories7 = [ { img: '/Images/story1.jpg', name: 'Lakshmi, 72', text: 'I sleep without fear and eat fresh food every day. This place gave me my smile back.' }, { img: '/Images/story2.jpg', name: 'Ravi, 68', text: 'They treated me like family and helped me walk again after surgery.' }, { img: '/Images/story3.jpg', name: 'Meera, 70', text: 'I love the evening music hour. Friends, care, and dignity—everything is here.' } ]; const faqs7 = [ { q: 'How are donations used?', a: 'We prioritize shelter, meals, medication, and emergency care. A small portion covers operations and volunteer training.' }, { q: 'Can I sponsor a resident?', a: 'Yes. You can sponsor a bed, meals, or medical checkups. We share periodic updates about the person you sponsor.' }, { q: 'Do you provide tax receipts?', a: 'Yes. You receive an 80G-compliant receipt via email immediately after a successful donation.' } ]; return (
